text: Heinävesi is a municipality in North Karelia, Finland. It had almost 3,710 living there in August 2013. The municipalities next to it are Savonlinna, Varkaus, Leppävirta, Tuusniemi, Outokumpu and Liperi. The most notable lakes in the area are Kermajärvi and Juojärvi. Both are very clean and bright. == Other websites == * The official Heinävesi page Category:Municipalities of North Karelia
title: Heinävesi
